messages.content:
You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web projects developed using PHP and the Laravel framework. I need to generate an OpenAPI Specification for a web project based on its backend source code. I'm now focusing on endpoint `/api/v1/posts/{post}/comments` with method GET, and here is the relevant information I found:

1. In `app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/PostCommentController.php`, `PostCommentController::class, 'index'` is implemented to process HTTP requests to `/api/v1/posts/{post}/comments` with HTTP method GET.

2. In `app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/PostCommentController.php`, `App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\PostCommentController@index` is implemented to process HTTP requests to `/api/v1/posts/{post}/comments` with HTTP method GET.

3. In `app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/PostCommentController.php`, `App\\Http\\Controllers\\Api\\V1\\PostCommentController@store` is implemented to process HTTP requests to `/api/v1/posts/{post}/comments` with HTTP method GET.

I'll provide you with the contents of the files mentioned above, you have the option to execute additional Unix commands to gather more information if necessary, but you must not run the source code of the project, and your task is to generate a dict of Response Objects (the value of paths.[endpoint].[method].responses) in Swagger 2.0 format.

You need to think step by step and provide an explanation of your results first. Then, output exactly "the final generated result begins" (I will split your output and then do json parse, so you must output it and do not change it), followed by the dict of Response Objects in JSON format. Do not include fields not mentioned above, and do not use references ($ref) in your output (try to obtain the structure by executing additional Unix commands).

I will examine the project structure and related resource class to infer the response schema for the GET endpoint. I will list relevant directories and view the Comment resource file to better shape the OpenAPI responses.

{'stdout': 'total 28
drwxr-xr-x 2 user user 4096 Jan  1  1970 .
drwxr-xr-x 6 user user 4096 Jan  1  1970 ..
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user  847 Jan  1  1970 Comment.php
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user  436 Jan  1  1970 Media.php
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user  840 Jan  1  1970 Post.php
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user  335 Jan  1  1970 Role.php
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user  753 Jan  1  1970 User.php
', 'stderr': ''}

function.name: run_command
function.description: Run a Unix command and get outputs in the project directory. You must not run any source code of the project.
